meanings.definition: Combine different forms of belief or practice
meanings.sent1: The teacher syncretised traditional teaching methods with modern technology to engage students.
meanings.sent2: The chef syncretised flavors from various cuisines to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent3: The cat syncretised its usual nap spot with the new cozy blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork syncretised colors and shapes in a mesmerizing way.
meanings.sent5: The garden syncretised different types of flowers, creating a beautiful tapestry of colors.

meanings.sent1: The DJ syncretised different music genres to keep the party going.
meanings.sent2: The architect syncretised traditional and modern designs in the building.
meanings.sent3: The siblings syncretised their favorite snacks to create a unique treat.
meanings.sent4: His speech syncretised humor and wisdom, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer syncretised fabrics and textures to craft a stunning dress.
